description:
Ricty Diminished is a font based on Inconsolata and Circle M+ 1m, optimized for the programming usage.


**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: font based on Inconsolata and Circle M+ 1m for programming
author: Raph Levien, itouhiro, M+ FONTS PROJECT, Yasunori Yusa
